attributes.action: We must refuse to pay £1.7Bn EU supplement
attributes.additional_details: A large proportion of the British public is already considerably upset over the undemocratic behaviour of the EU, and the recent demand for an extra £1.7Bn based on our economic performance is simply an insult.  The UK has worked hard and sacrificed too much in the recent budget cuts to sign over all this effort to the EU, and their cynical mismanagement.  We DEMAND that the PM does not pay this money, and takes a robust stance in resisting this gross unfairness.
